  • Constructor Details

    • RegistrationLoginViewModel

      public RegistrationLoginViewModel(Player playerModel, Team teamModel)
      Constructs the registration login view model and sets the player model instance and team model instance. Also initializes the error labels.
      Parameters:
      playerModel - player model instance
      teamModel - team model instance

  • Method Details

    • login

      public boolean login(String email, String password)
      Validates the given email and password and triggers a login in the player model if the validation was successful. Loads the team for the given player.
      Parameters:
      email - email of the player
      password - password of the player
      Returns:
      true if the login was successful otherwise false

    • register

      public boolean register(String name, String email, String password)
      Validates the given name, email and password and triggers a registration in the player model if the validation was successful.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the player
      email - email of the player
      password - password of the player
      Returns:
      true if the registration was successful otherwise false

    • isEmailValid

      private boolean isEmailValid(String email)
      Validates a given email against the email regex.
      Parameters:
      email - email of the player
      Returns:
      true if valid otherwise false
